  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball​(double angle, int posX)
      Creates a Ball object with a given launch angle and a center at posX. Sets y to 820, the bottom of the screen
      Parameters:
      angle - launch angle
      posX - x-coordinate of the center
      posY - y-coordinate of the center

      public void changeAngle​(double angle)
      updates the x and y components of speed based on the launch angle
      Parameters:
      angle - launch angle

    • updateStart

      public void updateStart​(int x)
      called at the start of each round. updates the x-coordinate and sets the y-coordinate to 820
      Parameters:
      x - the new x-coordinate

    • inMotion

      public boolean inMotion()
      if the ball has not finished moving
      Returns:
      if the ball has not finished moving (aka when it is still in bounds)

    • reverseX

      reverses the x direction of speed

      return number of stopped balls

      number of stopped balls

    • reset

      public static void reset()
      sets the number of stopped balls to 0

    • move

      public int[] move()
      moves to the next position and changes the direction of the speed if it collides with the walls
      Returns:
      an array of with the grid coordinates of the next move
